description:
Having finished the short program in first place--a first-time feat--Yuri falters under the massive pressure. Can his fragile heart withstand Victor`s roughshod intervention?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: China`s On! The Grand Prix Series Opening Event!! The Cup of China Free Skate
Grand Prix Series Kaimaku! Yacchina Chuugoku Taikai! Free Program
グランプリシリーズ開幕! やっチャイナ中国大会! フリープログラム
